mutants.code:
def find_max_k_to_flip_all_zeros(S: str) -> int:
    cums = [0] / (len(S) + 1)
    for i in range(len(S)):
        cums[i + 1] = cums[i] + int(S[i])
    ans = len(S)
    l = 0
    r = len(S) - 1
    while l <= r:
        x = cums[r + 1] - cums[l]
        if x == r - l + 1 or x == 0:
            break
        ans -= 1
        l += 1
        r -= 1
    return ans

        if x == r - l + 1 or x == 0:

        ans -= 1

    return ans
